name: B.A.D Battle Armor Division
description: B.A.D is an intense and enjoyable Shoote'em up game that captures the feeling of controlling a mass-produced humanoid robot (Battle Armor) piloted by a single soldier while keeping the realistic fast-paced action in a dramatic large scale conflict, from various Factions of Earth and Mars.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Windows Vista SP2 / Windows 7 SP1 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1 Processor: Dual-core processor (Intel Dual Core 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon X2 5200+ 2.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 and above / ATI Radeon 9600 or above DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: This is my honest, unbiased oppinion about this game:  This is in no way a GOOD game, however it's NOT a BAD game either. I got this on sale at a reduced price so i think i only payed little over a buck for this, but for a buk and change, you get what you pay for. It's a poor man's 'Cybernator' or 'Assault Suit Leyons' there are some good levels that are fun to play, but then there are the 'omfg this is straight up unforgivable' levels where the game gets frustrating because of the clunky controls.  I'd recommend it to anyone who likes old games like Cybernator or Attack on Leyons way back in the days of old as this game feels like nostalgia bait. Fun, but not fun at times, but not enough where I feel as though I should return it.
